replies.body: Go play Adventure Quest little boy!

> P.s. iv spent hundreds on this game my borther hasn't given them a cent so yea they really know how to piss off the right people.

lol, no, it's YOU who really knows how to piss off the right people.

You rented an parking space, and you pissed off the one who holds the ownership of the space. never mind if you spend thousands decorating that parking space or whatever, the owner doesn't want you to keep renting it, they don't want/care about your money simple.

Nothing wrong if a company cares about their game in general more so than the money that is flowing into their pockets, that's some true spirits. I hope they can keep following that.

Not to mention your name is kinda offensive I can't see why you wanna cherish that ign, but whatever. Unless this is already something you've changed to, *shudders*.

EDIT: Also I am not sure about the "f wits helping enemy team", was that referring to intentional feeders? Well report and ignore, don't rage because if you insult out of rage you're at fault as well.

> my brother threatens me with anthrax

> f wits

Another 12 year old i see.

\*Abuses Riot staff\*
\*Gets surprised when treated like sh!t by Riot staff\*
\*Obviously hasn't read the TOU and EULA*

FYI, by accepting the TOU and EULA you've given Riot permission to do whatever the hell they want to do to your account for no reason. They have every right to permaban you for doing nothing. Additionally, it's not Riots fault that there are 'toxic' members of the community, it's something that happens in **every single community in the world**, whether it's in real life or on the internet. Blame human nature, not Riot.
